doc:
Lena Ashwell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lena_Ashwell 0 Lena Margaret Ashwell, OBE (28 September 1872 – 13 March 1957) was a British actress and theatre manager and producer, known as the first to organise large-scale entertainment for troops at the front, which she did during World War I. Lena_Margaret_Ashwell , OBE ( 28_September_1872 – 13_March_1957 ) was a_British_actress_and_theatre_manager_and_producer , known as the_first to_organise large-scale_entertainment for troops at the_front , which she did during World_War_I.
